scripts.start:backend: npx wrangler pages dev ./ --kv "oh_file_url" --r2 "oh_file_r2" --binding BASIC_USER=admin --binding BASIC_PASS=123456 --ip 0.0.0.0 --port 8080 --persist-to ./data
scripts.build:frontend: cd frontend && npm install && npm run build
scripts.start: npm run build:frontend && npm run start:backend
scripts.ci-test: concurrently -k -s first "npm run start:backend" "wait-on http://localhost:8080 && mocha --exit"
